page.title: 01CULWORTH AND SURROUNDINGS
page.content: This area is exclusively rural with gently rolling hills and landscape dominated by green fields,hedges and trees. {The main residential area is the village of Culworth}which is served by a few shops,1 pub,1 church,1 school and agricultural craftsmen.It is a typical Northamptonshire village with buildings of mellow stone extending from the village green. The whole area is quiet and peaceful despite occasional American jets zooming overhead from the local base. The surrounding farmland is predominantly arable with grazing for sheep and some cattle. Public transport is limited but the majority of families possess at least one car.There is very little unemployment.The main shopping centre for inhabitants is Banbury.
